text: The Time Still Ticks is the debut EP by New Jersey melodic hardcore band To Kill The King. It was released in the summer of 2006. ==Track listing== # Sparks That Fly # Close Your Eyes (And Tell Me The First Thing You See) # Mutability # The Man With The Black Wings # Can't Wait To Get These Back (The Results) # Girls Just Wanna Have Fun (Hidden Track) ==Credits== * Rob Baranoff - vocals * Kevin Kumetz - guitar * Nick Mazoratti - guitar * Nick Van Zile - guitar * Matt Figliolino - bass * Vin Van Zile - drums ==References== Category:2006 EPs
title: The Time Still Ticks
